name: Amber Tail Adventure
description:
There is one powerful syndicate in this world.
It’s adepts learn how to survive in marginal mission conditions and use their abilities to deliver the expected package.
You are one of the adepts.
And here is your first mission.

Deliver the package to general Borbaross.

Action takes place at wartime, so you have to fight your way through enemy defenses.
Desert land, forest and mushroom world – this is what our hero will face to deliver the package.
Motto is: Never give up!

30 levels
3 bosses
More than 32 types of enemy defenses

4 abilities:
Speed up
Vigilance
Slow motion
Switch off

What else do you need to ensure in self-reliance and to take control of our hero!
